effects: Reduce ATK and MAG by 45% for 4 turns to all enemies
Increase resistance to all elements by 35% for 4 turns to all allies
Increase power of the next normal attack (+2.5x, max +10x)

desc_short: Reduce ATK and MAG for all enemies and boost all elemental resistances for all allies and boost next normal attack
降低全體敵人攻擊魔力和全屬性耐性的數值+提高下一回合普通攻擊的威力
적 전체에 공격력과 마력 감소+아군 전체에 모든 속성 저항력 상승+다음 턴에 일반 공격 위력 상승
Réduit l'ATT et la MAGIE de tous les ennemis, augmente toutes les résistances élémentaires de tous les alliés et augmente l'attaque normale au tour suivant
Verringert ANG /MAG aller Gegner, erhöht den nächsten normalen Angriff und erhöht alle Elementarresistenzen aller Verb.
Reduce ATQ/MAG y todas las resistencias elementales de todos los enemigos, y potencia el próximo ataque normal
